description.plain: Topic ist ein deutscher Musikproduzent, der vor allem durch Produktionen für Kayef und Liont und die enge Zusammenarbeit mit diesen bekannt wurde. Im Juli 2015 veröffentlichte er sein erstes eigenes Album namens Miles.

body.plain: Topic ist ein deutscher Musikproduzent, der vor allem durch Produktionen für Kayef und Liont und die enge Zusammenarbeit mit diesen bekannt wurde. Im Juli 2015 veröffentlichte er sein erstes eigenes Album namens Miles.

songs.title: Home

description.plain:
“Home” is a song by German DJ Topic, that features vocals by fellow German singer Nico Santos.

The song was a hit in Australia, Germany, and Austria.

songs.embed_content: Read “Home” by Topic on Genius

album.full_title: Spring Music 2016 by Warner Music Group
album.name: Spring Music 2016

body.plain:
“Home” is a song by German DJ Topic, that features vocals by fellow German singer Nico Santos.

The song was a hit in Australia, Germany, and Austria.

songs.full_title: Home (Alle Farben Remix) by Topic (Ft. Nico Santos)
songs.title: Home (Alle Farben Remix)

songs.lyrics:
17 ContributorsHome Lyrics[Verse 1: Nico Santos]
I'm halfway gone
We fought long enough, long enough and
We were holding ropes
But untied to love, untied to love saying
If we had a moment we could ignite
Instead it seems we're trying hard to start a fight
'long these streets you read my words in the night
You hear me call

[Pre-Chorus]
Let me come home to you, let me come home to you again
Don't let me lose you too
Your smile still echoes through my head
Let me come home to you, let me come home to you again
Don't let me lose you too
Tell me would you let me in

[Chorus]
Home again
Home again

[Verse 2: Nico Santos]
I'm losing light, see me burning out, burning out and
I guess all these nights will be lonely hours, lonely hours thinking
If we had a moment we could ignite
Instead it seems we're trying hard to start a fight
'long these streets you read my words in the night
You hear me call
You might also like[Pre-Chorus]
Let me come home to you, let me come home to you again
Don't let me lose you too
Your smile still echoes through my head
Let me come home to you, let me come home to you again
Don't let me lose you too
Tell me would you let me in

[Chorus]
Home again
Home again3Embed

songs.full_title: Find You by Topic (Ft. Jake Reese)
songs.title: Find You
songs.embed_content: Read “Find You” by Topic on Genius

annotatable.link_title: Find You by Topic (Ft. Jake Reese)
annotatable.title: Find You

songs.lyrics:
4 ContributorsFind You Lyrics[Verse 1]
When I'm looking for colors
When I'm stuck in a world of grey
There's a part of me pointing to you like a compass
Every inch of your body is
Like it's pencilled into my brain
And I carry you around like you fit in my pocket

[Pre-Chorus]
And nothing, and nothing they do
Could get me away from you
Yeah, nothing and nothing they do
Could get me away from you
'Cause I see you shining through

[Chorus]
No, I don't get lost
And it's all because
I know that I'll find you
Yeah, when the skies get dark
You're my Northern Star
And I know that I'll find you
Find you, find you
And I know that I'll find you
I know that I'll find you
You might also like[Verse 2]
There's a place I can go to
All I need is to close my eyes
And I'm back at a time when we never got older
I can feel your lips on me
Like we're still living in paradise
And you whisper in my ear like your hand's on my shoulder

[Pre-Chorus]
And nothing, and nothing they do
Could get me away from you
Yeah, nothing and nothing they do
Could get me away from you
'Cause I see you shining through

[Chorus]
No, I don't get lost
And it's all because
I know that I'll find you
Yeah, when the skies get dark
You're my Northern Star
And I know that I'll find you
Find you, find you
And I know that I'll find you
I know that I'll find youEmbed

songs.title: Break My Habits
songs.embed_content: Read “Break My Habits” by Topic on Genius
songs.lyrics:
2 ContributorsBreak My Habits Lyrics[Verse 1]
This is not like me, I don't get that deep
I'm usually puttin' all my walls up in-between
I cannot fight this 'cause you make me weak
My heart is pumpin' like it's following the beat

[Pre-Chorus]
You have got me feelin' like I'm trippin'
Seen a lot of shit, but you're the real thing
Nothing like a lovin' that I've witnessed
When you're with me

[Chorus]
So just feel my touch and let it
Make you feel alright
And I might just break my habits
And stay with you tonight
I'll break my habits
I'll break my habits
And stay with you tonight

[Post-Chorus]
I'll break my habits

[Verse 2]
Always thought I've been fine on my own
Now I'm relying on your love to get it on
You might also like[Pre-Chorus]
You have got me feelin' like I'm trippin'
Seen a lot of shit, but you're the real thing
Nothing like a lovin' that I've witnessed
When you're with me

[Chorus]
So just feel my touch and let it
Make you feel alright
And I might just break my habits
And stay with you tonight
I'll break my habits
I'll break my habits

[Post-Chorus]
I'll break my habits

[Bridge]
All that I need is a quick fix from you, baby
Don't wanna leave 'cause I give something new, so I'll

[Chorus]
I'll break my habit
I'll break my habits6Embed
